Section.name: About UCET
Section.description:
Universal College Of Engineering & Technology (UCET) is affiliated to JNTU Kakinada and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. Its campus tucked in a serene lush green and tranquil ambience at Dokiparru, Medikondur (Md), Guntur (Dist). It is only km away from Perecharla towards Narasaraopet on the Guntur Kurnool highway..
